byline.original: By BRENT McDONALD and HILLARY BACHELDER

lead_paragraph: Police departments are dropping a new technology into the middle of a complicated reality between officers and citizens, hoping it will heal public trust.
snippet: Police departments are dropping a new technology into the middle of a complicated reality between officers and citizens, hoping it will heal public trust....

headline.main: With Rise of Body Cameras, New Tests of Transparency and Trust
